openstack_sharedfilesystem_securityservi.description: Configure a Shared File System security service.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Shared File System client.

name.description: The name of the security service. Changing this updates the name

description.description: The human-readable description for the security service.

type.description: The security service type - can either be active\_directory,

dns_ip.description: The security service DNS IP address that is used inside the

ou.description: The security service ou. An organizational unit can be added to

user.description: The security service user or group name that is used by the

password.description: The user password, if you specify a user.

server.description: The security service host name or IP address.
